thread.title: 14 of the best cartoons about Donald Trump's first month in office
thread.title_full: 14 of the best cartoons about Donald Trump's first month in office

author: Mark Molloy
title: 14 of the best cartoons about Donald Trump's first month in office
text:
14 of the best cartoons about Donald Trump's first month in office Donald Trump's first month in office: the best cartoons Credit: Adams / The Telegraph Mark Molloy 17 February 2017 • 10:32am 
I t has been a tumultuous baptism of fire for Donald Trump in the White House hot seat during his first four weeks in office. 
Global protests over his controversial travel ban , repeated clashes with the press, plus high-profile sackings and resignations have made negative headlines since Trump’s inauguration. 
S ocial media has also taken particular delight in mocking 'The Donald' with memes over his aggressive handshakes, signing off on executive orders and slip-ups by White House Press Secretary Sean Spicer. eat my shorts pic.twitter.com/HLPE1DzO7Y — Trump Draws (@TrumpDraws) February 15, 2017 @Adamstoon1 Asked POTUS to rate his Bunny self... pic.twitter.com/qTsq5dRbIo — Asa Bennett (@asabenn) February 14, 2017 *record scratch* TRUDEAU: yup, that's me, you'e pro- TRUMP: personally I dont feel they're that small #TrudeauMeetsTrump pic.twitter.com/jXOFm5Jbiz — Andy Cole (@AndyCole84) February 13, 2017 
P olitical cartoonists have also lined up to take a pop at Trump, so here are some of the most-shared cartoons on Trump’s first few weeks in the office.
